    • Method Detail

      • solve

        public static java.lang.String solve(java.lang.String[][] tiles,
                                     int startX,
                                     int startY,
                                     java.lang.String oldPath,
                                     boolean hasKey,
                                     java.lang.String[][] tilesAtFirst,
                                     int startXAtFirst,
                                     int startYAtFirst)
        A modified BFS algorithm that attempts to find a solution to the level.
        Parameters:
        tiles - Array that contains information of the level layout
        startX - The x position where the search starts
        startY - The y position where the search starts
        oldPath - The path that the player has already travelled
        hasKey - Is the player carrying a key? These parameters are used to store information about the starting state of the first search so we can redo the search if we mess up.
        tilesAtFirst -
        startXAtFirst -
        startYAtFirst -
        Returns:
        Sequence of commands required to solve the level

      • solve

        public static java.lang.String solve(java.lang.String[][] tiles,
                                     int startX,
                                     int startY)
        A modified BFS algorithm that attempts to find a solution to the level. This method with less parameters is called when the search starts for the first time.
        Parameters:
        tiles - Array that contains information of the level layout
        startX - The x position where the search starts
        startY - The y position where the search starts
        Returns:
        A solution to the level

      • slidePlayer

        public static Point slidePlayer(int stepX,
                                int stepY,
                                Point tileVisiting,
                                java.lang.String[][] tiles,
                                boolean[][] visited,
                                Point[][] parents,
                                boolean hasKey)
        Simulates player movement when stepping on ice. Values of variables that the algorithm uses are passed to this method.
        Parameters:
        stepX - Horizontal movement of the step
        stepY - Vertical movement of the step
        tileVisiting - Location where the sliding is started
        tiles - Tile map of the level
        visited - Tiles that have been visited
        parents - Neighbours of visited tiles
        hasKey - Does the player have a key?
        Returns:
        The (x,y) location where the slide ends. Null if slide ends to a lava tile.

      • clone2DArray

        public static java.lang.String[][] clone2DArray(java.lang.String[][] array)
        Clones a 2D array
        Parameters:
        array - The array to clone
        Returns:
        cloned array
